infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow you to take photos for your profile and content uploads.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to let you select images for your profile and content uploads.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app saves images to your photo library when you choose to download or export content.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location is used to personalize certain features and improve your experience while the app is in use.
